examples.full_description: Mission relationships can access the associated scientist
Mission relationships can access the associated planet
Mission validations must have a name
Mission validations must have a scientist
Mission validations must have a planet

examples.description: must not allow a scientist to join the same mission twice
examples.full_description: Mission validations must not allow a scientist to join the same mission twice
Scientist relationships can access the associated missions
Scientist relationships can access the associated planets
Scientist validations must have a name
Scientist validations must have a field_of_study
Scientist validations must have a unique name
Missions POST /missions with valid data creates a new Mission
Missions POST /missions with valid data returns the associated Planet data
Missions POST /missions with valid data returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not creates a new Mission
examples.full_description: Missions POST /missions with invalid data does not creates a new Mission
Missions POST /missions with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: Missions POST /missions with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)

examples.description: returns an array of all scientists
examples.full_description: Scientists GET /index returns an array of all scientists
Scientists GET /index returns a status of 200 (OK)

examples.description: returns the matching scientist with their associated planets
examples.full_description: Scientists GET /scientists/:id with a valid ID returns the matching scientist with their associated planets
Scientists GET /scientists/:id with a valid ID returns a status of 200 (OK)
Scientists GET /scientists/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Scientists GET /scientists/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
Scientists POST /scientists with valid data creates a new Scientist
Scientists POST /scientists with valid data returns the associated Scientist data
Scientists POST /scientists with valid data returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not creates a new Scientist
examples.full_description: Scientists POST /scientists with invalid data does not creates a new Scientist
Scientists POST /scientists with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: Scientists POST /scientists with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
Scientists PATCH /scientists with valid data returns the associated Scientist data
Scientists PATCH /scientists with valid data returns a status code of 202 (accepted)
Scientists PATCH /scientists with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: Scientists PATCH /scientists with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
Scientists PATCH /scientists with invalid ID returns the error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Scientists PATCH /scientists with invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
Scientists DELETE /scientists/:id with a valid ID deletes the Scientist
Scientists DELETE /scientists/:id with a valid ID deletes the associated Missions
Scientists DELETE /scientists/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.full_description: Scientists DELETE /scientists/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
